body.name: OHREX S7 GPS Navigator for Car, 7 inch, with US Canada Mexico 2024 Maps, Free Lifetime Updates, GPS Navigation System for Truck, Semi Truck, RV, Trucker, Commercial Drivers
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 12 hrs 32 mins
features: 【PRE-LOADED 2024 North America Maps】 Pre-installed with the 2024 latest Canada USA Mexico Map, which has 2D / 3D map display. If you need to update the latest Map, please contact us to download. (Downloadable but not pre-installed maps: Europe, UK, Ireland, Australia,etc).multi-language Voice navigation: English, French, Spanish,etc.

【How to get Lifetime Map Updates 】 Get the latest map by connecting OHREX GPS Navigation to the Windows pc. You can also use an exteranl SD Card for map update (with Mac & Windows system). Lifetime Map is free updated without Ads,*No subscription requested !* You can regularly download latest data for maps, speed, and points of interest.

【 Easy to use】Easy to use dedicated GPS navigator with bright 7 inch Touch Screen. the large screen is clear and sensitive, 800 x 480 high-resolution, the display was clear and accurate. OHREX 7 inch Touch Screen GPS Navigation for Car, Truck. You can Customize Route According to Your Vehicle’s Weight, Length, Height and Width, Avoid Roads with Width/Height/Weight Restrictions. Improved bracket, easier to install than models with back clips, prevent falling falling off

【Intelligent Navigation】Features Postcodes, Address, Coordinates & POI, Driver Alerts, Street name Broadcasting, Lane Guidance, Estimated Arrival Time, Current Speed, Intelligent Route Planning with Fast or Economical Routes, Turn-By-Turn Real Voice Broadcast, Automatic Day & Night Mode Switching, Fast & Accurate GPS Tracking.Built-in FM Amplify volume function（NO radio）: it can transmit the navigation audio into the audio of car, increase the volume of navigation broadcast to make it clearer.

【Professional Solution】OHREX GPS navigation supply regular maps upgrades and any question inquiry. established professional technician team in uSA, have been recognized by our customers.*Note: after receiving GPS navigation, please use the ohrex Standard charger Cable to fully charge then use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I like it so far. GPS gave good directions.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great features with one annoying quirk
reviews.reviewText: Display is great - touchscreen is great, but it will not save the time zone EVER - it is always 6 hours ahead of accurate time.Plus each time you want to add a new destination address, you have to tell it that you are in UNITED STATES, then choose the city, then street, then street number.It's a time consuming if you have to do it frequently.But the screen display with directions is fantastic and accurate. Plus it alerts you if you are over the speed limit. It alerts a lot, but you can change the sensitivity to speed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Extremely Disappointed with the OHREX GPS Navigation for Car
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the OHREX GPS Navigation for Car, and I must say that it has been a complete letdown. The promises of up-to-date maps and accurate directions were far from reality, leaving me frustrated and wasting valuable time.One of the major issues I encountered with this GPS system is that it was not up to date with addresses. It was shocking to find that even basic addresses were missing or outdated. This made it incredibly difficult to navigate to my desired destinations, resulting in unnecessary detours and delays. It is absolutely unacceptable for a GPS system, especially one that claims to have free lifetime updates, to be so out of touch with current address information.Furthermore, the OHREX GPS Navigation failed to provide correct directions. There were numerous instances where it directed me to take wrong turns or provided confusing instructions. This not only caused unnecessary stress while driving but also wasted precious time and fuel. A GPS system should be reliable and accurate, but sadly, this one fell short on both counts.The lack of accuracy and up-to-date information severely impacted my overall experience with the OHREX GPS Navigation. It is disheartening to invest in a product that fails to deliver on its promises. I expected better from a GPS system that specifically caters to truckers, RV owners, and commercial drivers.I strongly advise against purchasing the OHREX GPS Navigation for Car. Its inability to provide accurate addresses and correct directions makes it an unreliable and frustrating tool. Save yourself the disappointment and consider exploring other GPS systems that have a proven track record of reliability and accuracy.I hope this review serves as a warning to other potential buyers who are considering the OHREX GPS Navigation for Car. Don't waste your time and money on a product that simply does not deliver on its claims.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Even in " shortest route mode", it takes you to a longer route. Sending it back, very disapointed

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: For the Price I do have to say it can compete with the expensive models. The large view screen is great and after a few minutes of exploring the settings and all it is easy to use. I will definitely be recommending this product to my friends.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Still working on.
reviews.reviewText: Love the size screen size for sure, a lot features that I still discovering. The only thing so far I’m not to happy about so much is that the voice don’t tell you in advance the real name of the coming exit or next street /avenue that’s is coming you need to take. Only says “keep the next right”” or “” next left””. But not the name of the street /exit to take. So weird. So I still checking if any control features will help to change it to make it to be accurate with the directions.So my experience so far it is so so.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good Product. It's a shame it does not show elevation.
reviews.reviewText: For me, the learning curve was steep and actually had too many functions for me. The screen is large and is easy to get through the options. I missed not having it show the elevation.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars . Good value easy to work
reviews.reviewText: Basic SAT GPS good for what I need. Point A to point B, can search for destinations between. Very basic, for those of you who use Garmin, or are used to the Google mapping, it's an adjustment, but doable.
